You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iexcl

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&iexcl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a1/index.htm U+000A1].
  * `&iexcl` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a1/index.htm U+000A1].
